targets.rawSql: select count(Name) from client

select count(jobstatus) from job
where starttime > now() - interval '24h' and jobstatus = 'T'

select count(jobstatus) from job
where starttime > now() - interval '24h' and jobstatus = 'R' or jobstatus = 'C'

SELECT count(volumename) FROM media
where volumename like '%iSCSI%' and volstatus = 'Append'

select count(jobstatus) from job
where starttime > now() - interval '24h' and jobstatus = 'A' or jobstatus = 'E'
SELECT SUM(jobbytes) AS Bytes FROM Job WHERE clientid='3';

SELECT 
 SUM(VolBytes) 
FROM 
 Media
where
mediatype='File172';

select name from job
where starttime > now() - interval '24h' and jobstatus = 'A' or jobstatus = 'E' 
limit 5

SELECT maxvols FROM pool
where name = 'FileARQ'

SELECT count(volumename) FROM media
where volumename like '%iSCSI%' and volstatus = 'Full'

SELECT count(volumename) FROM media
where volumename not like '%iSCSI%' and volumename like '%ARQ%' and volstatus = 'Full'

SELECT count(volumename) FROM media
where volumename not like '%iSCI%' and volumename like '%ARQ%' and volstatus = 'Append'

SELECT 
 SUM(VolBytes) 
FROM 
 Media
where
mediatype='FileiSCSI';

SELECT maxvols FROM pool
where name = 'FileARQ-iSCSI'
select count(Name) from client

SELECT count(volumename) FROM media
where volumename not like '%SQL2%' and volumename like '%SQL%' and volstatus = 'Full'

select count(jobstatus) from job
where starttime > now() - interval '24h' and jobstatus = 'R' or jobstatus = 'C'

select count(jobstatus) from job
where starttime > now() - interval '24h' and jobstatus = 'T'

select count(jobstatus) from job
where starttime > now() - interval '24h' and jobstatus = 'A'
SELECT SUM(jobbytes) AS Bytes FROM Job WHERE clientid='3';

SELECT 
 SUM(VolBytes) 
FROM 
 Media
where
mediatype='File172';

select name from job
where starttime > now() - interval '24h' and jobstatus = 'A' 
limit 5

SELECT maxvols FROM pool
where name = 'FileSQL'

SELECT count(volumename) FROM media
where volumename not like '%SQL2%' and volumename like '%SQL%' and volstatus = 'Append'
select count(Name) from client

SELECT count(volumename) FROM media
where volumename like '%Vol-%' and volstatus = 'Full'

select count(jobstatus) from job
where starttime > now() - interval '24h' and jobstatus = 'R' or jobstatus = 'C'

select count(jobstatus) from job
where starttime > now() - interval '24h' and jobstatus = 'T'

select count(jobstatus) from job
where starttime > now() - interval '24h' and jobstatus = 'A'
SELECT SUM(jobbytes) AS Bytes FROM Job WHERE clientid='3';

SELECT 
 SUM(VolBytes) 
FROM 
 Media
where
mediatype='File172';

where starttime > now() - interval '24h' and jobstatus = 'A'

where name = 'File'
